name: R1R1
description:
I am a playstation type of guy, so I have always know by heart how to get the PS buttons on a controller, but all the games on pc use XBOX buttons game input so I made a small game with Godot that will train your brain on where those buttons are.

It is kind of Aimlab, but for Xbox controllers.

At the moment is still in development, I need to finish the "Game Over" bit and add some stats on when you finish lives so you can see whether you are improving.

The game is open source and available here: https://github.com/vikkio88/r1r2
